basics.name: Noah Okamoto
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Finance and Management Information Systems in the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2021.

highlights: Cater to guests' food, and beverage, needs
Maintain individualized guest interactions in a professional manner
Organize chairs and umbrellas to guests' preferences
Convey aloha at all times to maximize guest experience

awards.title: Shidler Global Leader scholarship
awards.summary: The Shidler Global Leaders (formerly the Fish Scholars) are considered the best and brightest students the Shidler College of Business has to offer. The Shidler Global Leaders program seeks to reward and support those students who have the propensity to achieve excellence in their business education. Students who have a proven record of academic and other achievements, who possess the necessary skills, drive, determination, and character to aim for excellence in their undergraduate education are most likely to strive for excellence in their personal and professional lives. These students are strong candidates to become the leaders of tomorrow in business and the community.
